title: 【官方发布】【AuthPro】 - 世界上最快最好最安全的账户保护插件！
author: kv516
txt_content:
本帖最后由 kv516 于 2013-12-28 14:04 编辑 

If you use SimpleAuth, too many players registered can make your server lag. SO there is a new FASTER solution called AuthPro. 
如果你用SimpleAuth, 太多的人注册会让你的服务器很慢. 所以这里有一个更快的解决方案叫: AuthPro. 

 If you like please rate this plugin 5 stars. 
如果你喜欢这个插件请评价5颗星. 

 This plugin is based on SimpleAuth, but it is faster than it because it won't cache the user data to memory.
 这个插件建立在SimpleAuth之上, 但是做了很多改进和提高以提高其运行速度.
